name: vite-template-monorepo
description: Monorepo with frontend, backend, and proxy service

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ../service && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:service"
scripts.start:frontend: cd frontend && npm run build && npm run preview
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:frontend" "npm run start:service"
